scripts.cpln-image-new: npm version patch && cpln image build --push --org initech --name $npm_package_name:$npm_package_version
scripts.cpln-image-workload-new: npm version patch && cpln image build --push --org initech --name $npm_package_name:$npm_package_version && cpln workload create --name $npm_package_name-dev --image //image/$npm_package_name:$npm_package_version --public --org initech --gvc bds-dev
scripts.cpln-image-workload-update: cpln image build --push --org initech --name $npm_package_name:$npm_package_version && cpln workload update bds-dynamodb-dev --set spec.containers.$npm_package_name.image=//image/$npm_package_name:$npm_package_version  --org initech --gvc bds-dev
scripts.cpln-workload-update: cpln workload update bds-dynamodb-dev --org initech --gvc bds-dev --set spec.containers.$npm_package_name.image=$npm_package_name:$npm_package_version
scripts.cpln-workload-redeploy: cpln workload force-redeployment bds-dynamodb-dev --org initech --gvc bds-dev
